des: "My mother has been making this cake for over 40 years and it is always a crowd pleaser! The ingredients are from the original recipe. I have had good success with substituting SplendaÂ® for half the sugar and using egg whites instead of the whole eggs. Frost, if desired. I use vanilla frosting and dust with cinnamon-sugar."
ins:
Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C). Grease a 9x13-inch baking dish.
Mix sugar, vegetable oil, eggs, salt, cinnamon, buttermilk, flour, baking powder, and blueberries, stirring after each addition, in a large bowl. Pour batter into prepared baking dish.
Bake in the preheated oven until a toothpick inserted in the center comes out clean, 35 to 45 minutes.
